article: irish police said the reputed chief of staff of the irish republican army , thomas `` slab '' murphy , has been arrested and was scheduled to appear thursday in court on tax-evasion charges associated with money laundering and fuel smuggling .
abstract: irish police arrest reputed ira chief for money laundering fuel smuggling
